question: Following representation P, Q and R denote few steps of Griffith Experiment. Identify the correct one(s).
P. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
Q. S strain (Heat killed) -> Inject into mice -> Mice die
R. R strain -> Inject into mice -> Mice live
explanation: In Griffith's experiment: R strain (rough, non-virulent) does not kill mice (Mice live). S strain (smooth, virulent) kills mice. Heat-killed S strain does not kill mice. Therefore, only representation R is correct[cite: 147, 148, 149, 150, 151, 154].
